players.name: Alice
memory: You investigated Bob and discovered that they are the mafioso.
You: "I investigated Bob and found he's the mafioso. Let's vote him out to save the town!"
Bob: "That's ridiculous, Alice! If you're the detective, why reveal so early? You're probably the mafioso trying to frame me. Vote for Alice!"
You: "I stand by my investigation—Bob is the mafioso. His deflection is desperate; vote him out to save us all!"
